# Enterprise Scale your business with FARM Framework's enterprise-grade features, dedicated support, and professional services. Trusted by organizations worldwide for mission-critical applications. **99.9% uptime SLA** ‚Ä¢ **24/7 support** ‚Ä¢ **SOC 2 Type II certified** ‚Ä¢ **HIPAA compliant** ## Enterprise Features ### üîí Advanced Security & Compliance - **Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)** with TOTP, SMS, and hardware keys - **Single Sign-On (SSO)** integration with Active Directory, SAML, OIDC, and OAuth providers - **Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)** with attribute-based permissions and dynamic roles - **Zero-Trust Security Model** with micro-segmentation and identity verification - **Data Loss Prevention (DLP)** with content inspection and policy enforcement - **Audit Logging & Compliance** with immutable logs and regulatory reporting - **Vulnerability Scanning** with automated security assessments - **End-to-End Encryption** for data at rest, in transit, and in processing **Compliance Certifications:**
SOC 2 Type II HIPAA GDPR PCI DSS ISO 27001
### ‚ö° Performance & Scalability - **Auto-Scaling Infrastructure** with predictive scaling and cost optimization - **Global CDN Integration** with edge caching and geographic distribution - **Database Optimization** with sharding, read replicas, and connection pooling - **Caching Strategies** with Redis, Memcached, and application-level caching - **Load Balancing** with health checks, failover, and traffic distribution - **Performance Monitoring** with real-time metrics, alerting, and root cause analysis - **Code Splitting & Optimization** with tree shaking and bundle analysis - **Edge Computing** with serverless functions and global deployment **Performance Benchmarks:** | Metric | Community | Professional | Enterprise | |--------|-----------|-------------|------------| | **Response Time** | < 200ms | < 100ms | < 50ms | | **Concurrent Users** | 1K | 10K | 100K+ | | **Database Connections** | 100 | 1K | 10K+ | | **API Rate Limit** | 1K/min | 10K/min | Unlimited | | **Storage** | 10GB | 100GB | Unlimited | | **Bandwidth** | 100GB/mo | 1TB/mo | Unlimited | ### üõ† Developer Experience & DevOps - **Advanced CLI Tools** with project scaffolding, deployment automation, and environment management - **CI/CD Pipeline Integration** with GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins, and Azure DevOps - **Infrastructure as Code (IaC)** with Terraform, Kubernetes, and Docker support - **Environment Management** with staging, testing, and production environments - **Blue-Green Deployments** with zero-downtime deployments and automated rollbacks - **Feature Flags & A/B Testing** with gradual rollouts and experimentation - **Observability Stack** with distributed tracing, metrics collection, and log aggregation - **Developer Productivity Tools** with IDE extensions, code generators, and debugging tools ### ü§ñ AI & Machine Learning Enterprise Features - **Enterprise AI Models** with fine-tuned models for specific business domains - **Model Deployment & Versioning** with MLOps pipeline and model registry - **GPU Cluster Management** with resource allocation and cost optimization - **Edge AI Deployment** with model optimization for edge devices - **Custom Model Training** with domain-specific datasets and transfer learning - **AI Governance & Ethics** with bias detection and explainable AI - **Data Pipeline Automation** with ETL/ELT processes and data quality monitoring - **Federated Learning** with privacy-preserving machine learning ## Support & Service Plans
### Starter Plan **$199/month** Perfect for growing teams and small enterprises. - Email support (24h response SLA) - Community forum access - Basic monitoring & alerting - Standard security features - Up to 10 developers - 99.5% uptime SLA - Monthly check-ins
Email Support Community
### Professional Plan **$599/month** Enhanced support for production applications. - Priority support (8h response SLA) - Video consultations & code reviews - Advanced monitoring & analytics - Enhanced security features - Up to 50 developers - 99.9% uptime SLA - Weekly check-ins - Custom integrations (up to 5)
Priority Support Video Calls
### Enterprise Plan **Custom pricing** Comprehensive support for mission-critical applications. - 24/7 dedicated support (1h response SLA) - Dedicated customer success manager - On-premise deployment options - Advanced security & compliance - Unlimited developers - 99.99% uptime SLA - Daily check-ins available - Unlimited custom integrations - Architecture review & optimization
24/7 Support Dedicated CSM
## Professional Services ### üèó Architecture & Design Services #### System Architecture Review **Starting at $5,000** Comprehensive analysis of your current or planned system architecture with detailed recommendations for optimization, scalability, and security. **Deliverables:**

‚úì Legacy system analysis

‚úì Training & knowledge transfer

 ### üìö Training & Enablement #### Developer Team Training **$2,500 per team (up to 10 developers)** Comprehensive training program to get your development team productive with FARM Framework quickly. **Training Modules:** - FARM Framework fundamentals - Best practices & patterns - Security implementation - Performance optimization - AI integration techniques - DevOps & deployment strategies **Format:** 2-day intensive workshop + 30-day follow-up support #### FARM Framework Certification **$500 per developer** Official certification program validating expertise in FARM Framework development and best practices. **Certification Levels:** - **Associate Developer** - Fundamentals & basic implementation - **Professional Developer** - Advanced features & optimization - **Solutions Architect** - System design & enterprise patterns **Benefits:** Official certificate, digital badge, priority support access ## Enterprise Customer Success Stories ### Fortune 500 Manufacturing Company **Challenge:** Legacy ERP modernization for 50,000+ employees **Solution:** FARM Framework migration with custom AI analytics **Results:** 60% faster processing, $2M annual savings, 99.9% uptime _"FARM Framework enabled us to modernize our entire ERP system while maintaining business continuity. The AI integration capabilities transformed our decision-making process."_ ‚Äî **Sarah Johnson**, CTO, GlobalManufacturing Corp ### Healthcare Technology Startup **Challenge:** HIPAA-compliant telehealth platform for rapid scaling **Solution:** FARM Framework with enterprise security features **Results:** 0 to 100K users in 6 months, full HIPAA compliance, $50M funding _"The built-in security features and compliance tools in FARM Framework Enterprise allowed us to focus on our core product instead of infrastructure concerns."_ ‚Äî **Dr. Michael Chen**, Founder & CEO, TeleHealth Innovations ## Security & Compliance Deep Dive ### Data Protection & Privacy - **Data Residency Controls** - Choose specific geographic regions for data storage - **Right to be Forgotten** - Automated personal data deletion workflows - **Consent Management** - Granular privacy preferences and consent tracking - **Data Classification** - Automatic sensitive data identification and handling - **Backup & Recovery** - Point-in-time recovery with encrypted backup storage - **Data Anonymization** - Production-safe data masking for development/testing ### Incident Response & Business Continuity - **24/7 Security Operations Center (SOC)** - Real-time threat monitoring - **Incident Response Team** - Dedicated security experts for critical issues - **Disaster Recovery** - RTO < 4 hours, RPO < 1 hour - **Business Continuity Planning** - Comprehensive continuity strategies - **Penetration Testing** - Quarterly security assessments - **Threat Intelligence** - Proactive threat detection and prevention ## Deployment Options | Feature | Cloud (SaaS) | Hybrid Cloud | On-Premise | |---------|-------------|-------------|------------| | **Setup Time** | < 1 hour | 1-2 weeks | 2-4 weeks | | **Maintenance** | Fully managed | Shared | Self-managed | | **Scalability** | Auto-scaling | Manual/Auto | Manual | | **Compliance** | Standard | Custom | Full control | | **Cost Model** | Subscription | Usage-based | License + Infrastructure | | **Support Level** | Standard | Enhanced | Premium | ## Getting Started with Enterprise ### Step 1: Assessment & Planning **Free consultation** to understand your requirements, current architecture, and business objectives. ### Step 2: Proof of Concept **30-day POC** to validate FARM Framework fit for your specific use case and requirements. ### Step 3: Implementation Planning **Detailed roadmap** with timelines, milestones, and resource requirements for full implementation. ### Step 4: Production Deployment **Guided deployment** with our expert team ensuring successful launch and optimal configuration. ### Step 5: Ongoing Support **Continuous partnership** with dedicated support, regular reviews, and optimization recommendations. ### Ready to Scale? Contact our enterprise team for a customized solution that meets your specific needs. **Enterprise Sales:** enterprise@farm-framework.com **Phone:** +1 (555) 123-FARM **Schedule Demo:** [Book a consultation](https://cal.com/farm-framework/enterprise-demo) **Response Time:** < 4 hours for enterprise inquiries **Free Enterprise Trial:** Get started with a 60-day free trial of FARM Framework Enterprise, including full support and professional services consultation.

# Learn

Master FARM Framework with our comprehensive learning resources.

## Tutorials

Step-by-step guides to help you build real applications.

<Card>
  <CardContent>
    ### Beginner Tutorials - **Your First FARM App** - Build a todo application
    from scratch - **Authentication Setup** - Implement user registration and
    login - **Database Integration** - Connect and query MongoDB - **API
    Development** - Create RESTful endpoints with FastAPI
  </CardContent>
</Card>

<Card>
  <CardContent>
    ### Intermediate Tutorials - **Real-time Features** - Add WebSocket
    communication - **File Uploads** - Handle media and document uploads -
    **Payment Integration** - Process payments with Stripe - **Deployment
    Guide** - Deploy to production with Docker
  </CardContent>
</Card>

<Card>
  <CardContent>
    ### Advanced Tutorials - **Microservices** - Break down monoliths into
    services - **Performance Optimization** - Scale to handle high traffic -
    **Testing Strategies** - Comprehensive testing approaches - **CI/CD
    Pipelines** - Automated deployment workflows
  </CardContent>
</Card>

## Best Practices

Learn from the community's collective experience.

- **Code Organization** - Structure your FARM projects
- **Security Patterns** - Protect your applications
- **Performance Tips** - Optimize for speed and efficiency
- **Error Handling** - Graceful failure management

## Video Courses

Visual learners, we've got you covered with comprehensive video content.

<Card>
  <CardContent>
    ### FARM Fundamentals (4 hours) Complete introduction to FARM Framework
    covering all essential concepts.
  </CardContent>
</Card>

<Card>
  <CardContent>
    ### Building Production Apps (8 hours) Advanced course on building scalable,
    production-ready applications.
  </CardContent>
</Card>

<Card>
  <CardContent>
    ### DevOps for FARM (6 hours) Deployment, monitoring, and maintenance of
    FARM applications.
  </CardContent>
</Card>

<Callout type="tip">
  All video courses include downloadable code examples and exercises.
</Callout>

documents.content:
# Showcase

Discover amazing applications built with FARM Framework by our community.

## Featured Projects

Handpicked projects that showcase the power of FARM Framework.

<Card>
<CardContent>
### TaskFlow Pro
A comprehensive project management application with real-time collaboration, built for enterprise teams.

**Features:** Real-time updates, team collaboration, advanced analytics  
**Tech Stack:** FARM + WebSockets + Redis  
**Live Demo:** [taskflow-pro.com](https://taskflow-pro.com)

</CardContent>
</Card>

<Card>
<CardContent>
### EcoMarket
Sustainable marketplace connecting eco-friendly businesses with conscious consumers.

**Features:** Vendor management, payment processing, environmental impact tracking  
**Tech Stack:** FARM + Stripe + GIS  
**Live Demo:** [ecomarket.app](https://ecomarket.app)

</CardContent>
</Card>

<Card>
<CardContent>
### MindSpace
Mental health platform providing therapy matching and progress tracking.

**Features:** Secure messaging, appointment scheduling, progress analytics  
**Tech Stack:** FARM + WebRTC + ML  
**Live Demo:** [mindspace.health](https://mindspace.health)

</CardContent>
</Card>

## Community Projects

Built by developers like you, for the community.

- **Recipe Keeper** - Personal recipe management
- **Fitness Tracker** - Workout and nutrition tracking
- **Study Buddy** - Collaborative learning platform
- **LocalEvents** - Community event discovery

## Submit Your Project

Share your FARM Framework project with the community!

  We're always looking for inspiring projects to feature. Submit yours today!
</Callout>

documents.title: Templates
documents.content:
# Templates Jumpstart your FARM Framework project with our professionally crafted templates. Each template is production-ready and includes comprehensive documentation, best practices, and deployment guides. All templates are fully typed with TypeScript and include Docker configurations for seamless deployment. ## Quick Start Get started with any template using the FARM CLI: npx create-farm-app my-app --template [template-name] cd my-app npm run dev ## Template Showcase ### Basic Template **Perfect for:** General web applications, MVPs, learning projects - React + TypeScript frontend with Vite - FastAPI backend with automatic API generation - MongoDB database with ODM - Tailwind CSS for styling - Zustand for state management - TanStack Query for data fetching - Docker configurations included npx create-farm-app my-app --template basic **Project Structure:** ``` my-farm-app/ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ apps/ ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ web/ # React frontend ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ src/ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ components/ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ pages/ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ stores/ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ services/ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ package.json ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ api/ # FastAPI backend ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ src/ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ routes/ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ models/ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ database/ ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ requirements.txt ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ farm.config.ts ``` ### AI Chat Template **Perfect for:** Chatbots, AI assistants, conversational apps - Streaming AI responses with WebSocket support - Multiple AI provider support (Ollama, OpenAI) - Conversation management and history - Real-time typing indicators - Message threading and contexts - Local AI model integration with Ollama - WebSocket-based real-time communication npx create-farm-app my-chat-app --template ai-chat **Key Features:** - **Streaming Responses**: Real-time AI response streaming - **Multi-Provider**: Switch between local and cloud AI models - **Conversation Memory**: Persistent chat history - **WebSocket Integration**: Real-time bidirectional communication ### AI Dashboard Template **Perfect for:** Analytics platforms, ML dashboards, data visualization - Interactive data visualization with Recharts & D3.js - ML model integration and monitoring - Real-time analytics and metrics - Custom chart components - Data processing pipelines - AI-powered insights generation - Export capabilities for reports npx create-farm-app my-dashboard --template ai-dashboard **Includes:** - **Chart Library**: Line, bar, pie charts, and heatmaps - **ML Integration**: Model metrics and prediction viewers - **Data Processing**: Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn - **Visualization**: Plotly integration for advanced charts ### E-commerce Template **Perfect for:** Online stores, marketplace platforms, retail applications - Complete shopping cart functionality - Product catalog with search and filters - Payment processing (Stripe, PayPal) - Order management system - Inventory tracking - Admin dashboard for store management - User authentication and profiles - Mobile-responsive design npx create-farm-app my-store --template ecommerce **Commerce Features:** - **Payment Integration**: Stripe and PayPal support - **Inventory Management**: Real-time stock tracking - **Order Processing**: Complete order lifecycle - **Admin Panel**: Store and product management ### Content Management System **Perfect for:** Blogs, documentation sites, content platforms - Rich text editor with media support - Content versioning and publishing workflow - SEO optimization tools - Media library with cloud storage - User roles and permissions - Multi-language support - Custom content types - API-first architecture npx create-farm-app my-cms --template cms **Content Features:** - **Rich Editor**: TipTap-based content editing - **Media Management**: Image and document handling - **Publishing Workflow**: Draft, review, publish states - **SEO Tools**: Meta tags, sitemap generation ### API Only Template **Perfect for:** Microservices, mobile backends, headless applications - FastAPI-only architecture (no frontend) - Enhanced API documentation with OpenAPI - Advanced authentication and authorization - Microservice-ready structure - Database migrations and seeding - Comprehensive testing suite - Docker and Kubernetes configurations npx create-farm-app my-api --template api-only **API Features:** - **OpenAPI Docs**: Automatic API documentation - **Testing Suite**: Comprehensive test coverage - **Auth System**: JWT and OAuth integration - **Microservice Ready**: Scalable architecture ## Template Comparison | Feature | Basic | AI Chat | AI Dashboard | E-commerce | CMS | API Only | |---------|--------|---------|-------------|------------|-----|----------| | **Frontend** | ‚úÖ React | ‚úÖ React | ‚úÖ React | ‚úÖ React | ‚úÖ React | ‚ùå None | | **Backend** | ‚úÖ FastAPI | ‚úÖ FastAPI | ‚úÖ FastAPI | ‚úÖ FastAPI | ‚úÖ FastAPI | ‚úÖ FastAPI | | **Database** | ‚úÖ MongoDB | ‚úÖ MongoDB | ‚úÖ MongoDB | ‚úÖ MongoDB | ‚úÖ MongoDB | ‚úÖ MongoDB | | **AI Integration** | ‚ùå | ‚úÖ Ollama/OpenAI | ‚úÖ ML Models | ‚ùå | ‚ùå | ‚ùå | | **Real-time** | ‚ùå | ‚úÖ WebSocket | ‚úÖ Analytics | ‚ùå | ‚ùå | ‚ùå | | **Payment** | ‚ùå | ‚ùå | ‚ùå | ‚úÖ Stripe/PayPal | ‚ùå | ‚ùå | | **CMS Features** | ‚ùå | ‚ùå | ‚ùå | ‚ùå | ‚úÖ Full CMS | ‚ùå | | **Auth System** | Basic | ‚úÖ Advanced | ‚úÖ Advanced | ‚úÖ Advanced | ‚úÖ Advanced | ‚úÖ Advanced | | **Best For** | Learning | Chat Apps | Analytics | E-commerce | Content | APIs | ## Feature Add-ons Enhance any template with additional features: ### Authentication Feature Add comprehensive authentication to any template: npx create-farm-app my-app --template basic --features auth **Includes:**

‚úì JWT token management

‚úì OAuth provider support

‚úì User registration and login

‚úì Protected routes and middleware

‚úì Password reset functionality

 ### AI Integration Feature Add AI capabilities to any template: npx create-farm-app my-app --template basic --features ai **Includes:**

‚úì Ollama local AI integration

‚úì OpenAI API support

‚úì Model management utilities

‚úì Inference caching

‚úì GPU acceleration support

 ### Real-time Feature Add WebSocket real-time functionality: npx create-farm-app my-app --template basic --features realtime **Includes:**

‚úì WebSocket connection management

‚úì Real-time data synchronization

‚úì Live updates and notifications

‚úì Connection status monitoring

 ## Advanced Configuration ### Database Options {`// farm.config.ts export default defineConfig({ database: { type: 'mongodb', url: process.env.MONGODB_URL || 'mongodb://localhost:27017/farmapp' } });`} {`// farm.config.ts export default defineConfig({ database: { type: 'postgresql', url: process.env.DATABASE_URL || 'postgresql://user:pass@localhost/farmapp' } });`} ### AI Configuration For AI-enabled templates, configure your AI providers: {`// farm.config.ts - AI Chat Template Example export default defineConfig({ template: 'ai-chat', ai: { providers: { ollama: { enabled: true, url: 'http://localhost:11434', models: ['llama3.1', 'codestral'], defaultModel: 'llama3.1', autoStart: true, autoPull: ['llama3.1'] }, openai: { enabled: true, apiKey: process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY, models: ['gpt-4', 'gpt-3.5-turbo'], defaultModel: 'gpt-3.5-turbo' } }, routing: { development: 'ollama', production: 'openai' } } });`} ## Next Steps After creating your project: 1. **Setup Environment** cp .env.example .env # Edit .env with your configuration 2. **Install Dependencies** npm install 3. **Start Development** npm run dev 4. **Deploy to Production** npm run build npm run deploy Need help choosing a template? Check out our [Template Selector Tool](/templates/selector) or join our [Discord community](https://discord.gg/JmeShQtv) for personalized recommendations.
documents.excerpt: Jumpstart your FARM Framework project with our professionally crafted templates.
